_header: When Jesu Christ was done on rood
Note: For the earlier version on which this is based see 2165.
_description: The Assumption of Our Lady, added to the Cursor Mundi (3474) — 784 lines

BodFair14.First Lines:
Quen ihesus criste was done on rode& þoled dede alle for
                    our gode…
BodFair14.Last Lines:
…al at þis boke heris & redislauedi ham help in al
                    þaire nedis
BodFair14.Attributed Author:
Iste liber restat domino iohanni de croft (f.
                    102ra)
BodFair14.Attributed Title: Of þe life of our lauedi (f. 83ra)

BodLauMis416.Transcription:
Heryth now that wille haue medeAnd I shalle you the story redeof
                    the holy maydins byrth
BodLauMis416.Attributed Title:
lystyn now to my lessonThat wille here of the concepcoun (f.
                    120)

BLAdd36983.First Lines:
When Ihesu crist was done on Rodeand Soffred deþ ffor manis
                    gode…
BLAdd36983.Last Lines:
…lete me So long & [sic] þy Seruisþat I
                    may com to paradysAs [sic] Myn endyng I pray to þeIn tyme
                    of Nede Myn help þu be
BLAdd36983.Attributed Title:
Who so desireth grete Pardon / Here of our ladies assumpcion (f.
                        148vb)

BLCottVesAIII.First Lines:
[Q]Ven iheus crist was don on rodeAnd thold ded al for vr
                    gode…
BLCottVesAIII.Last Lines:
…At mine ending i prai it teAmen say yee say par
                    charite
BLCottVesAIII.Note:
Space was left for enlarged initial ‘Q’, which was left
                    blank.

EDCPCM.First Lines:
qVen ihesu crist was don on rodeAnd þolid dede al for us
                    gode…
EDCPCM.Last Lines:
…Þate þai mai þaim penance beteQuen þat
                    penance til ende of w[ ]

CollArmsAr57.First Lines:
Whenne ihesu crist was done on rode& suffered deep for oure
                    gode…
CollArmsAr57.Last Lines:
…She lyued ȝeere but seuen & nyneSixty ȝeer
                    & þre bi taleffoure moneþes & two wikes al
                    haleþat I bihet now haue I doneLady bi þi sone in
                    troneLet me so longe in þi seruyseÞat I may come to
                    paradiseAt myn endynge I preye to þeIn tyme of nede my help
                    þou be
CollArmsAr57.Attributed Title:
Who so desireþ greet pardoun / Here of Oure lady assumpcioun (f.
                        117va, rubric)
